Title: Damage ratio
Definition: The estimated repair cost of an asset divided by the total replacement cost of the asset [0-n] used in vulnerability functions.

Title: Mean damage ratio
Definition: The mean value in a distribution of estimated repair costs divided by the total replacement cost of an asset [0-n] used in vulnerability functions.

Title: Probability
Definition: The probability of reaching or exceeding a damage limit state specified in a fragility function [%].

Title: Damage index
Definition: A specified index or classification of damage levels, which may be numeric or non-numeric.

Title: Loss ratio
Definition: The loss to an asset divided by the total replacement cost of the asset [0-n] as a function of damage state, used in damage-to-loss-models.

Title: Mean Loss Ratio
Definition: The mean loss ratio in a distribution of losses divided by the total replacement cost of the asset [0-n] as a function of damage state, used in damage-to-loss-models.

Title: Downtime (vulnerability)
Definition: Duration of downtime, used in vulnerability modelling of business or service interruption.

Title: Casualty ratio (vulnerability)
Definition: The number of expected casualties (injuries) as a proportion of total inhabitants of an asset or population [0-1] used in casualty functions.

Title: Fatality ratio (vulnerability)
Definition: The number of expected people killed as a proportion of total inhabitants of an asset or population [0-1] used in fatality or mortality functions.

Title: Total economic loss
Definition: The monetary value of estimated economic impact or total loss (ground up loss in insurance terminology). Impact_type denotes whether this refers to total, direct, or indirect loss.

Title: Total insured loss
Definition: The monetary value of estimated insured losses.

Title: Loss Ratio
Definition: Estimated loss as a proportion of total replacement cost or insured value. Impact_type denotes whether this refers to total, direct, or indirect loss.

Title: Number of casualties (fatalities)
Definition: The estimated number of casualties or fatalities.

Title: Casualty ratio (loss)
Definition: Proportion of estimated casualties or fatalities in the total population.

Title: Number of people killed
Definition: The estimated number of people killed.

Title: Fatality ratio (loss)
Definition: Proportion of estimated people killed in the total population.

Title: Annual average loss
Definition: Expected loss over a one-year time period according to long-term averages. Impact_type denotes whether this refers to total, direct, or indirect loss.

Title: Probable Maximum Loss
Definition: Estimated maximum loss occurring at a given exceedance probability or return period.

Title: Value at Risk
Definition: Estimated minimum loss likely to be equalled or exceeded in a given year for a given probability.

Title: Tail Value at Risk
Definition: Estimated losses at or exceeding a specified value at risk VaR (estimate of average losses given that a severity threshold has been exceeded).

Title: Disruption (loss)
Definition: Duration of disruption to businesses or services, expressed as a number of days.

Title: Disruption (loss)
Definition: Duration of disruption to businesses or services, expressed as a monetary loss.

Title: Number of assets
Definition: The estimated number of structures, or length of infrastructure, damaged.

Title: Number of people displaced
Definition: The estimated number of people displaced due to physical damage and disruption.

Title: Number of days that people are displaced
Definition: The estimated number of days that people are displaced due to physical damage and disruption.
